mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( u_id, mem_type_id, u_name, u_email, u_nick, u_pw, u_tel, u_reg_date, u_marketing, u_gender, u_birth ) VALUES ( member_seq.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{uName}, #{uEmail}, #{uNick}, #{uPw}, #{uTel}, DEFAULT, #{uMarketing}, #{uGender}, TO_DATE(#{uBirth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )

INSERT INTO seller ( s_id, account_info_id, mem_type_id, s_email, s_com_name, s_pw, s_tel, s_reg_date, s_addr, s_reg_num, s_marketing_consent, s_approval, s_rep_name ) VALUES ( seller_seq.NEXTVAL, #{accountInfoId}, DEFAULT, #{sEmail}, #{sComName}, #{sPw}, #{sTel}, DEFAULT, #{sAddr}, #{sRegNum}, #{sMarketingConsent}, #{sApproval}, #{sRepName} )
